job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree/University degree or equivalent experience

jd: Job Description -Senior Java Developer(W2)Location: Tampa, FL (3 days Onsite - Hybrid) only localDuration: 6+ months Responsibilities/Skills:• Design, develop and support application using Java technologies and Spring Framework• Hands on experience with Microservice architecture and Java Webservices is desired• Working knowledge on relational database management systems (RDBMS) such as Oracle• Working knowledge on Unix/Linux Shell commands• Experience working with Git/Bitbucket• Must have good understanding of SDLC standards, Release management procedures and Code Quality and standards• Experience with any of the following technologies will be a plus - JMS, Kafka, Redhat OpenShift,• Experience of collaboration tools (source control)• Work in collaborative environment while owning individual work streams and executing tasks with minimal guidance Qualifications:• 6-8 years of relevant experience Education:• Bachelors degree/University degree or equivalent experience
